con:config.con:query: SELECT CUSTOMERID,ACCOUNTNUMBER,CURRENCY FROM V_AUTHORISATION WHERE ROLETYPE='EIER' AND CUSTOMERID IN ( SELECT CUSTOMERID FROM V_AUTHORISATION WHERE CUSTBANKID='4201' AND LENGTH(CUSTOMERID) =11 and ROLETYPE='EIER' AND CUSTOMERID NOT IN (SELECT CUSTOMERID FROM STO_AGREEMENT) GROUP BY CUSTOMERID HAVING COUNT(CUSTOMERID) > 1 ) ORDER BY CUSTOMERID FETCH FIRST 5 ROW ONLY
select unique(ACCOUNTNUMBER),CUSTOMERID,CURRENCY from V_AUTHORISATION where CUSTOMERID = '${Properties#customerid}' fetch first 2 ROWS ONLY

con:request.name: SO_Balance_FallsBelow_Create_V2_0

value="${Properties#PaymentChannel_BM}"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="dd5dbe72-42d8-4a28-a725-5224c185545b"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> <urn:standingOrder> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:recurrence>DAILY</urn1:recurrence> <urn1:dueDates> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:dueDate>${Properties#DueDate}</urn1:dueDate> </urn1:dueDates> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>BEFORE</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:exemptions> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:exemption> <urn1:startDate>${Properties#ExceptionStartDate}</urn1:startDate> <urn1:endDate>${Properties#ExceptionEndDate}</urn1:endDate> <urn1:recurring>false</urn1:recurring> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:description>DescriptionOneExemption</urn1:description> </urn1:exemption> </urn1:exemptions> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#currencyCode}"> <urn2:amount>10000</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount>
</urn1:amount> </urn1:split> </urn1:splits> <urn1:paymentInfo> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currency>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:paymentInfo> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:transaction> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#currencyCode}"> <urn2:amount>${Properties#Amount}</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount>
</urn4:amount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAgent> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:bic>${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn2:bic> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:addressType>HOME</urn2:addressType> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postCode>3333</urn2:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:townName>test</urn2:townName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:countrySubDivision>testing</urn2:countrySubDivision> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>Cred Name</urn2:name> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:addressType>HOME</urn2:addressType> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postCode>4343</urn2:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:townName>test</urn2:townName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:countrySubDivision>testing</urn2:countrySubDivision> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currency>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn2:currency> </urn4:creditorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:transaction> <urn1:standingOrderType>BALANCE</urn1:standingOrderType> <!--Optional:--> </urn:standingOrder> </urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<!--Optional:--> <urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment>AFTER</urn1:bankHolidayAdjustment> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:exemptions> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:exemption> <urn1:startDate>${Properties#ExceptionStartDate}</urn1:startDate> <urn1:endDate>${Properties#ExceptionEndDate}</urn1:endDate> <urn1:recurring>false</urn1:recurring> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:description>DescriptionOneExemption</urn1:description> </urn1:exemption> </urn1:exemptions> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:balanceTriggerType> <urn1:limitType>BELOW</urn1:limitType> <urn1:balanceLimit currency="${Properties#DebitCurrency}"> <urn2:amount>${Properties#BalanceLimitAmount_Above}</urn2:amount> </urn1:balanceLimit> </urn1:balanceTriggerType> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn1:splits> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:split> <urn1:creditAccount>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn1:creditAccount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn1:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#currencyCode}"> <urn2:amount>10000</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount>
</urn1:amount> </urn1:split> </urn1:splits> <urn1:paymentInfo> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#accountNumber}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currency>${Properties#currencyCode}</urn2:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
</urn1:paymentInfo> <urn1:transaction> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="${Properties#currencyCode}"> <urn2:amount>${Properties#Amount}</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount>
</urn4:amount> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn4:chargeBearer>CRED</urn4:chargeBearer> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAgent> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:bic>${Properties#CreditorAgent}</urn2:bic> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn2:postCode>3232</urn2:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:townName>test</urn2:townName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:countrySubDivision>testing</urn2:countrySubDivision> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->
</urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>Cred Name</urn2:name> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:addressType>HOME</urn2:addressType> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn2:postCode>5546</urn2:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:townName>test</urn2:townName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:countrySubDivision>testing</urn2:countrySubDivision> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:country>${Properties#CreditorCountry}</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:-->
</urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
</urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#CreditAccountNumber}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currency>${Properties#CreditorCurrency}</urn2:currency> </urn4:creditorAccount> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
</urn1:transaction> <urn1:standingOrderType>BALANCE</urn1:standingOrderType> <!--Optional:-->
</urn:standingOrder> </urn:standingOrderCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
